players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "I think Alice is lying about being the detective. Why would she investigate me first night?"
Diana: "If Alice was the detective, why would she investigate me first night? That makes no sense. She's probably mafia trying to frame me."
You: "I am the detective. Diana is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Diana to win."
